name: Mortal Kombat 2600
description:
This is a Mortal Kombat prototype for the Atari 2600 / Atari VCS, developed during the Retro Platform Jam # 2.

There are currently four characters available (Raiden, Scorpion, Sub Zero, Kano) for player1 and player2.

During the game title you can change the character using the left / right buttons, and with the reset switch you can change the scene. To start the game there must be pressed the fire buttons of player1 and player2.

The controls are simple:

- Up: Jump

- Left / Right: walk

- Forward && Fire: Punch.

- Down && Fire: Power

- If the character is jumping && Fire: Flying kick.

For fatalities: Down && Forward && Fire.
